c1.name: Material Circulation
c1.descriptionRaw: Every 8,000 Max HP Kirara possesses will cause her to create 1 extra <color=#FFD780FF>Cat Grass Cardamom</color> when she uses <color=#FFD780FF>Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch</color>. A maximum of 4 extra can be created this way.
c1.description: Every 8,000 Max HP Kirara possesses will cause her to create 1 extra Cat Grass Cardamom when she uses Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch. A maximum of 4 extra can be created this way.

c2.name: Perfectly Packaged
c2.descriptionRaw:
When Kirara is in the Urgent Neko Parcel state of <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color>, she will grant other party members she crashes into Critical Transport Shields.
The DMG absorption of Critical Transport Shield is 40% of the maximum absorption <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color>'s normal Shields of Safe Transport are capable of, and will absorb <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> with 250% effectiveness.
Critical Transport Shields last 12s and can be triggered once on each character every 10s.
c2.description:
When Kirara is in the Urgent Neko Parcel state of Meow-teor Kick, she will grant other party members she crashes into Critical Transport Shields.
The DMG absorption of Critical Transport Shield is 40% of the maximum absorption Meow-teor Kick's normal Shields of Safe Transport are capable of, and will absorb Dendro DMG with 250% effectiveness.
Critical Transport Shields last 12s and can be triggered once on each character every 10s.

c3.name: Universal Recognition
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Meow-teor Kick by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Steed of Skanda
c4.descriptionRaw: After active character(s) protected by <color=#FFD780FF>Shields of Safe Transport</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Critical Transport Shields</color> hit opponents with Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, Kirara will perform a coordinated attack with them using <color=#FFD780FF>Small Cat Grass Cardamoms</color>, dealing 200% of her ATK as <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color>. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 3.8s. This CD is shared between all party members.
c4.description: After active character(s) protected by Shields of Safe Transport or Critical Transport Shields hit opponents with Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, Kirara will perform a coordinated attack with them using Small Cat Grass Cardamoms, dealing 200% of her ATK as Dendro DMG. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 3.8s. This CD is shared between all party members.

c5.name: A Thousand Miles in a Day
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Countless Sights to See
c6.descriptionRaw: All nearby party members will gain 12% All Elemental DMG Bonus within 15s after Kirara uses her Elemental Skill or Burst.
c6.description: All nearby party members will gain 12% All Elemental DMG Bonus within 15s after Kirara uses her Elemental Skill or Burst.
